definitions.definition: to move your hand or an object onto the surface of something so that it touches it, usually with force:
examples: Teachers are not allowed to hit their pupils.

definitions.definition: to touch something with sudden force:
examples: They were going about 60 kilometres an hour when their car hit the tree.

definitions.definition: a thing or person that is very popular or successful:
examples: The Beatles had a string of number-one hits in the 1960s.
